mainBoard.name: Confound
mainBoard.originalText:
Counter target spell that targets one or more creatures.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: Confound doesn’t resolve if the targeted spell has been countered or does not still target one or more permanents that are still creatures and are still on the battlefield. Confound is different from other such spells in that it actually specifies that the spell must target a creature, not just be able to target a creature or that the spell has a certain number of targets.

mainBoard.originalText: Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Rest now. You've neither won nor lost, but this battle is over for you just the same." —Teferi

foreignData.flavorText: „Ruhe Dich aus. Du hast zwar weder verloren noch gewonnen, aber diese Schlacht ist jetzt für Dich vorbei." —Teferi
foreignData.name: Wegschwemmen
foreignData.text: Bestimme eine Farbe. Bringe alle bleibenden Karten dieser Farbe auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: « Reposez-vous maintenant. La bataille est finie pour vous, que vous ayez gagné ou perdu.» — Téfeiri.
foreignData.name: Grand nettoyage
foreignData.text: Renvoyez tous les permanents de la couleur de votre choix dans les mains de leurs propriétaires.

mainBoard.name: Wash Out
mainBoard.originalText: Return all permanents of the color of your choice to their owners' hands.
mainBoard.text: Return all permanents of the color of your choice to their owners' hands.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Let insight and energy be your guides." —The Blind Seer, to Gerrard

foreignData.flavorText: „Lasse Einsicht und Verständnis Deine Führer sein." —Der blinde Seher zu Gerrard
foreignData.name: Chromatische Sphäre
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}, opfere die Chromatische Sphäre: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe. Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: « Que la sagesse et l'énergie vous guident. » — Le Voyant aveugle, à Gerrard.
foreignData.name: Sphère chromatique
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}, sacrifiez la Sphère chromatique : Ajoutez un mana d'une couleur de votre choix à votre réserve. Piochez une carte.

mainBoard.name: Chromatic Sphere
mainBoard.originalText: o1, ocT, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Draw a card.

rulings.text: This is a mana ability, which means it can be activated as part of the process of casting a spell or activating another ability. If that happens you get the mana right away, but you don’t get to look at the drawn card until you have finished casting that spell or activating that ability.

mainBoard.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card.
